meanings.definition: To remove the reproductive organs of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian desexed the stray cat to prevent unwanted litters.
meanings.sent2: It is common practice to desex pets to control the pet population.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy thought he could outsmart the vet and avoid being desexed.
meanings.sent4: After being desexed, the cat seemed to have a newfound sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: The decision to desex your pet can lead to a healthier and happier animal.

meanings.sent1: The desexed dog was a beloved member of the family.
meanings.sent2: Many animal shelters offer desexed pets for adoption.
meanings.sent3: The desexed rabbit hopped around the yard with joy.
meanings.sent4: The desexed cat was content to spend lazy afternoons napping in the sun.
meanings.sent5: Having a desexed pet can help prevent certain health issues in the long run.
